name: Cardinal Cross (itch)
description:
When Lana Brice, a small time Raider Scavenger meets her mysterious client, she realises her life just took a very wrong turn in the worst way possible.

Being forced to join a stranger's fight, can she discover her feelings towards injustice? Will this careless adventure become the sparks of a Galactic disaster?

You can get a free key for this game if you are a Coolpaca or beyond tier on my Patreon (Which comes with NSFW version of my newer games, manga shorts, emojis, bonus artwork and monthly mini games depending on your tier! Please check it out.)
